item.title: David Tepper says Fed could cut a few more times, but easing too much risks entering 'danger territory'
item.description: His comments come after the central bank lowered interest rates by a quarter point Wednesday, while signaling two more reductions are coming this year...

item.title: NBA star Kevin Durant can't unlock his Coinbase bitcoin account. His agent is thrilled
item.description: Houston Rockets star forward Kevin Durant can't access his Coinbase account or the bitcoin held there. His agent says that's a good thing.

item.title: Here are five key takeaways from the Fed's big interest rate decision
item.description: The Federal Reserve on Wednesday delivered on a widely anticipated quarter percentage point interest rate cut.
